meanings.sent1: The antique vase was worthful to the family.
meanings.sent2: Her hard work was worthful to the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the shiny toy was worthful enough to hide it.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, the old photograph was worthful like a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The rare gemstone was so worthful that it sparkled with brilliance.

meanings.sent1: The kind gesture was worthful to receive.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated student was worthful of praise for his efforts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy seemed worthful of a treat for his antics.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worthful like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was worthful enough to be displayed in a museum.
